title: Data Preparation
text:
Sources
The underlying data of this report was sourced from two datasets:

DAVE_PORTNOY_PIZZA_REVIEW_DATA (available here as a .csv – ~1.1MB)
This data set is a pizza slice review data set from Dave Portnoy who reviews pizza locations primarily in New York.  This data set includes a lot of information, but it includes the Yelp Rating of the restaurant at the time of the review, as well as Dave’s score of the pizza he ate.
NYC_HEALTH_INSPECTION_DATA (available here as a .xlsx – ~37.4MB)
This data set provide every public health inspection result for all the restaurants in NYC.



Data Preparation and Transformation
In order to get the data into final form for dashboard & report production, we performed the following manipulations. Comments have been provided in the following code chunks for your reference. The R programming language was used for data prep and manipulation.
